description: Entrance way to castle on right side of image; yellow roof with grey accents; larger building in the background; yellow decorative trim on front of building; four gold trees to the left of entrance way; blue, white, and pink clouds in the top right corner of image with a blue textured sky;
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: House (Nijo Castle)
